title: Connection Error
body:
hello Everyone
i have been having some internet troubles when i try to load a game it disconnects me from. But, sometimes it doesn't do that and lets me through and it's getting really annoying. Can someone please tell whats wrong so i can still play the game without getting disconnected? 

Thank you

replies.body:
Hey summoner,

This sounds to me like a classic firewall issue. Try following the instructions in [this video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GyJisyEQ248) to stop your firewall from blocking League. If that doesn't work, then I'm going to need you to answer these questions for me if you can:

1. Are you on a wifi/wireless connection, or are you playing with an ethernet/wired connection?

+ What is your ping usually?

+ Could other people be using this connection when you disconnect?

+ What anti-virus do you have if any?

Hello, 

I finally figured out the problem. Thank you for replying to me.
